quality_gates.name: overall_test_coverage
quality_gates.description: Overall system test coverage must meet 85% threshold
recommendations: Increase test coverage by 85.0 percentage points
Focus on untested modules and edge cases
Add integration tests for complex workflows

quality_gates.name: critical_component_coverage
quality_gates.description: Critical components (controllers, plant models) must have ≥95% coverage
recommendations: Increase critical component coverage by 95.0 percentage points
Prioritize controllers and plant models testing
Add property-based tests for stability verification

quality_gates.name: safety_critical_coverage
quality_gates.description: Safety-critical mechanisms must have 100% test coverage
recommendations: Improve safety_critical_coverage by 100.0 points

quality_gates.name: test_pass_rate
quality_gates.description: Test pass rate must be ≥95% for production deployment
recommendations: Fix failing tests to improve pass rate by 95.0 percentage points
Investigate and resolve test failures
Consider test environment stability issues

quality_gates.name: system_compatibility
recommendations: Improve system compatibility score by 85.0 points
Address cross-domain integration issues
Validate interface compatibility

quality_gates.name: performance_benchmarks
quality_gates.description: Performance benchmarks must pass regression detection
recommendations: Improve performance_benchmarks by 5.0 points

quality_gates.name: numerical_stability
quality_gates.description: Controllers must demonstrate numerical stability under test conditions
recommendations: Improve numerical_stability by 5.0 points

quality_gates.name: documentation_completeness
quality_gates.description: API documentation and usage guides must be comprehensive
recommendations: [OK] Quality gate passed
